cool dude. BIG THX for everything you do. you win life.
Hope you enjoyed the Tour - see you next year.
Demonoid rejected the torrent as it probably thought it was too big at 62KBytes. The torrent hash is registered on the Demonoid tracker so get the torrent from here instead.
Thanks for helping out - I'll keep the seedbox churning it out for a few days to help it along but I need the bandwidth for MVGroup torrents so eventually you're on your own.
Thanks for helping with the seeding.

Ta Basil from all the Expats - Thanks - Brilliant - Superb - you've brought an amazing race to thousands round the world - thanks but more than that - you've allowed them to properly view a race how it should be viewed. MAny MAny Thanks and see you next year.
